(UNITURN mérőállomás alsó szerelőlap pizero bolcso)
(cmd line: -i usb_kengyel.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.010

fmax900
fmin400
fratio0.6

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.020 #furatok
c2 = 0.040 #letörések
c3 = 0.080 #keret

(körvonal)
b outline 0,0 size44,28 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.5,0.5 r0

l 11,0 11,8.2 z$z1 c$c3
l 33,0 33,8.2 z$z1 c$c3

#l 0,21 6,21 z$z1 c$c3
#l 44,21 38,21 z$z1 c$c3

l 0,18.7 44,18.7 z1.2 c$c3 noc

(2)
b outline 46,0 size44,28 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.5,0.5 r0 nl0,1,0,1

l 57,0 57,8.2 z$z1 c$c3
l 79,0 79,8.2 z$z1 c$c3

#l 46,21 52,21 z$z1 c$c3
#l 90,21 84,21 z$z1 c$c3

l 46,23.7 90,23.7 z1.2 c$c3 noc

(3)
b outline 92,0 size55.7,15 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.5,0.5 r0 nl1,0,1,1

l 98,0 98,8 z$z1 c$c3
l 138.2,0 138.2,8 z$z1 c$c3

l 112,10 124,10 z$z1 c$c3

(4)

b outline 92,17 size55.7,15 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.5,0.5 r0 nl1,1,1,1

l 98,17 98,25 z$z1 c$c3
l 138.2,17 138.2,25 z$z1 c$c3

l 112,27 124,27 z$z1 c$c3
